snippet: The move was made quickly to affirm Mr. Daly’s slot as reports have been circulating that Alec Baldwin is in talks for a late-night role.
lead_paragraph: The move was made quickly to affirm Mr. Daly’s slot as reports have been circulating that Alec Baldwin is in talks for a late-night role.

headline.seo: NBC Renews ‘Last Call’ With Carson Daly
headline.main: NBC Renews ‘Last Call’ With Carson Daly
headline.print_headline: NBC Renews ‘Last Call’ With Carson Daly
